content.en: Milk analysis revolution: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the accuracy of determining various properties of milk. These algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and partial least squares regression, are used in combination with spectroscopy techniques to predict fatty acid profiles, classify milk powder, analyze protein and fat content, and even diagnose pregnancy in dairy cows. By harnessing the power of machine learning, researchers hope to gain valuable insights into milk composition and cow health.
content.da: Mælkeanalyse-revolution: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af bestemmelsen af forskellige egenskaber ved mælk. Disse algoritmer, som genetiske algoritmer og partial least squares regression, bruges i kombination med spektroskopi-teknikker til at forudsige fedtsyreprofiler, klassificere mælkepulver, analysere protein- og fedtindhold og endda diagnosticere graviditet hos malkekøer. Ved at udnytte maskinlæringens kraft håber forskerne at opnå værdifuld indsigt i mælkens sammensætning og køernes sundhed.
